alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:25AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lafayette and southwestern Iowa Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 424 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Platteville to near St. Donatus. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mineral Point, Darlington, Shullsburg, Belmont, Benton, New Diggings, Elk Grove, Rewey, Platte Mounds, Calamine, and Lead Mine. This includes U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 23 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
